title: Avengers
description: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's nightest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

title: Frozen
description: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinte winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranomal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse
